segments.text: Diane Grant ? I haven't seen you for ages !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Pretty good . Say , you've really changed !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , well , I've lost some weight . And my hair is longer than before .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , you look great ! How are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm doing really well . I got married about three years ago . I have two kids now .
segments.speaker: S2
